name: The Calm After the Ice Barrier's Storm
text: Tribute any number of "Ice Barrier" monsters; Special Summon the same number of Level 4 or lower "Ice Barrier" monsters with different names from each other from your Deck. During your Main Phase, except the turn this card was sent to the GY: You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 of your "Ice Barrier" monsters that is banished or in your GY; add it to your hand. You can only use each effect of "The Calm After the Ice Barrier's Storm" once per turn.
